headline: Jeep Maker Stellantis Shakes Up North American Executive Ranks
summary: The moves mark the automaker’s most visible shake-up under an interim management committee headed by Chairman John Elkann.

headline: Trump EV Skepticism Threatens $54 Billion in Korea Plans
summary: (Bloomberg) -- South Korean companies are reconsidering their $54 billion investment blitz to build electric-vehicle battery plants in the US over concerns President-elect Donald Trump could undo tax credits for EVs.Most Read from BloombergA Chicago Skyscraper Cements the Legacy of a Visionary Postmodern ArchitectNYC’s Run-Down Bus Terminal Gets Approval for $10 Billion RevampKansas City Looks Back on its Long, Costly Ride With MicrotransitSome Korean companies have slowed or hit the pause butto
